rooms.description: Large open space with natural lighting and a view of the garden. The living room incorporates Vastu principles by aligning with the north-east corner for positive energy.
Located adjacent to the kitchen, offering easy accessibility and natural lighting. The design follows Vastu guidelines by situating it in the south-west corner.
Spacious kitchen area designed with efficient workflow. Appliances are arranged per building norms and Vastu recommendations.
Comfortable guest room with a balcony overlooking the garden. Placed in the north-west direction to enhance energy flow as per Vastu principles.
Modern bathroom integrated into the guest suite. The water element is balanced with other elements as advised by local norms.

openings.description: Main entrance door oriented in the north for positive energy as per Vastu.
Direct access to the two-car garage. The design ensures smooth vehicular movement.

rooms.description: Largest bedroom with a private balcony overlooking the north garden. Vastu guidelines suggest placing the master bedroom in the northeast.
Well-lit bedroom with its own balcony, positioned in the east for optimum energy.
Additional bedroom featuring a spacious balcony. Aligned according to Vastu principles on the west side.
A quiet study area for work or reading, located in a serene corner of the villa.

openings.description: Spacious balcony attached to the master bedroom offering panoramic views.

rooms.description: Dedicated gymnasium area with ample space for equipment and natural ventilation. Designed following Vastu principles by placing it in the east to harness positive energy.
Storage area designed for utilities and maintenance supplies, placed in a convenient location.

openings.description: Access to the two-car garage on the ground floor, ensuring connectivity between levels.

note: Disclaimer: This architectural plan is a conceptual representation and should be reviewed by certified professionals before implementation. Please note that local building norms, Vastu principles, and zoning regulations must be thoroughly checked for compliance.
